attributes.action: remove the whole current political system, close both houses, and go away.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole UK political system is rotten to the core - we will no longer tolerate this. Please remove yourselves, dont bother trying to hold an election - you are all corrupt. Just go away, stop stealing our money, and stop telling us what to do. Once you have left the rest of us will sort something out - lets face it, it wont be any worse than you lot.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
